name: Cargo In The Caribbean
description:
Overview

you play as a cargo ship delivering cargo from island to island within these confided waters. Unfortunately these waters are infested with pirates and for some reason they are all fighting. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

Crash into the island with the ring around it to collect or deposit cargo. Beware colliding with a cannon ball will result in losing a container.

Also, no your boat doesn't have guns (I know you were wondering)

Scoring 

1 container = 1 point 

2 container = 2 points

3 container = 3 points

4 container = 8 points

That's right a full ship is worth a heap more

Controlls

WASD, Arrow keys, Controller stick: move

Music:

https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/ 

The Buccaneer's Haul by Shane Ivers - https://www.silvermansound.com
